meta.title: HRXEL - Human Capital Solutions & Organizational Excellence

hero.title: Your Partner for Human Capital Solutions & Organizational Excellence
hero.description: A Saudi platform specializing in providing integrated solutions for individuals and companies in the fields of human capital, organizational excellence, and executive search, with local expertise and deep knowledge of the Saudi market.
hero.button: We know best... start with us

consultants.title: Meet Our Consultants
consultants.subtitle: Expert guidance from industry professionals with deep local knowledge.

consultant1.name: Dr. Hamza
consultant1.title: Human Capital Solutions Consultant
bio: PhD from the UK and Master's from the USA in Human Resources Management
Led recruitment and talent acquisition teams in major companies
Developed effective policies and strategies to improve organizational efficiency

consultant2.name: Eng. Omar Al-Ghamdi
consultant2.title: Organizational Excellence Consultant
bio: Expert in organizational compliance and development
Held leadership positions at BAE Systems and participated in international conferences
Received innovation awards and contributed to building performance strategies and improving work environments
